Hydras:

"How sweet..."hissed the male"Of course, revenge and destruction i=
t's an essencial part of predacons but I'm thankfull that you decide to wai=
t... Until times come.. After Unicron's destruction, we will have some time=
 to work in a way to destroy those weak-spark Maxi-fool... and every help, =
my little and dangerous lady, will be apreciated; by now, what're your skil=
ls?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, March 05, 2005 3:33 AM
  Subject: Re: Reclusa=




  Reclusa::

  She was slightly shocked he knew her name when she had n=
ot spoken it,
  but did not let it show.  He probably was listening in on t=
he whole
  trip through Perceptor's comlink, she thought. She smiled as he =
shook
  her hand. "I am pleased to be here. I must admit, I was rather hopi=
ng
  that the Maximals would have been stamped out by now. But pleased to
 =
 see that they have not been able to stop us either."  She still stood
  re=
gally before him. "I will tell you this now. I do have personal
  plans of =
revenge later on. A score to settle with them, if you will.
  But revenge i=
s a dish best served cold. So I will wait for the proper
  time. But untill=
 that time comes, I wish to assist you in dealing with
  this, ah, Unicron =
situation."  She smiled at him with a sweet, yet
  slightly evil look. "If =
this Unicron wins, then we can't win over the
  Maximals. So, let me know h=
ow I can help with this matter."

  She kept her cool, confident and royal =
optics on Hydras. If her
  progams ever evolved into anything, it was never=
 trust another bot. Never.
